title: Has anyone ever killed a bear with bare hands and without weapons of any kind? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, C. DALE PETERSEN. suffocated a black mountain grizzly bear by arm in the throat and used his teeth that grapples a jugular on the grizzly neck. The grizzly fainted and he finished it off with a stick by striking repeatedly at the head. That's one of the 2 stories. The other was seen a man and a grizzly bear in the pit, deep in the woods that both were killed. No body knows what happen but that bear was killed by bare hands as well. Movie film ”The Revenant” was inspired by that story and novel.

I don’t think it is possible but I’ve heard this story of a mighty Indian wrestler who had confronted a bear, (probably an Indian sloth bear, not grizzly) with his bare hands by putting his hands intothroat until the bear retreated and ran for its life. The story says that the wrestler survived with a few teeth missing and some minor maul injuries. It is just a story anyway but if you consider the size and physique of both man and bear (doesn’t matter which kind) the probability of an unarmed man getting away alive is close to null, let alone killing the bear.

Daniel Boone, Davy Crockett I believe did.Using a knife. It wasn't an impossible task as these were eastern and southeastern bears which are a lot smaller than western black bears or grizzlies. This happened quite a few times. A lot of these stories are pro ably hyped up, but I know of one man in Jackson Hole, Wyoming,a hunter and guide killed a bear by choking and biting. And it wasn't an eastern bear.

An adult brown bear in good health? Not a chance. A fully grown polar bear? Ditto. However, humans don’t fight animals with bare hands. Our minds allow us to develop weapons. People are really good at killing everything. We have to be constrained from killing animals and each other for that matter. The first person to pick up a stick , armed themselves with a weapon. It’s how we are.

Yes, there was a Wyoming man who was attacked by a grizzly, and with his right arm shoved down its throat, he resorted to biting its throat. He severed its jugular and shortly after it fell unconscious, he then beat it over the head with a stick while it was down.
